briefTitle: SH T00186 Phase II/ III Optimal Drospirenone (DRSP) Dose Finding and Placebo-controlled Comparative Study
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Comparative Study to Investigate the Optimal Dose of Drospirenone for Dysmenorrhea With SH T04740A [Drospirenone 1 mg/Ethinylestradiol 20 µg (as ß-cyclodextrin Clathrate)], SH T 04740E [Drospirenone 2 mg/Ethinylestradiol 20 µg (as ß-cyclodextrin Clathrate)] and SH T00186D [Drospirenone 3 mg/ Ethinylestradiol 20 µg (as ß-cyclodextrin Clathrate)] Administered Orally for 16 Weeks (4 Cycles), and to Confirm the Efficacy of SH T00186D for Dysmenorrhea.
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate efficacy of drospirenone for dysmenorrhea.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Total Dysmenorrheal Score at Final Evaluation
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline and up to 4 Cycles (28 days per cycle)
